title: BOI I LOVE THE REMAKE SYSTEM
body: Why cant we remake even though he was afk, hadnt moved, and hadnt bought.{{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}}   lost a lot of lp

replies.body: I'm able to see since it's a replay, but you do need to type [**/remake to start the vote**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686). Beyond that, that renekton needs to have been AFK/DC for at least 90 straight seconds for a remake to be flagged as well. Him attempting to rejoin like he did might have interrupted that timer.
Yea, it must have interrupted the timer because typing remake at 3 mins just brought up a message saying there needs to be one or more players that didnt connect or something.
